pre_desc: I am a web and cross-platform developer and programmer!
pre_btn: Do you want to know more?
abt_info: Here you will find information about me, as well as some skills I have acquired over the years.
abt_knowme2: Hello! I am Endika Mimenza, a developer and programmer living on the outskirts of Bilbao, Euskadi, Spain.
abt_knowme3: I am graduated as a web application developer and also in multi-platform applications. I have worked with various languages and projects, from HTML/CSS, Java, Kotlin, and PHP to environments like Drupal, web design, and business management systems like CRM-ERP.
abt_knowme4: In my free time, I love spending time with my friends, watching movies, and dedicating time to my hobbies and projects.
abt_knowme5: I am open to new job opportunities, whether it's Front-End or Back-End. If you think I could fit into your project, feel free to contact me!
time_info: Here you will find different titles and languages that I have acquired over the years.
time_txt1_desc: In May 2019, I obtained the B2 Basque Title certifying the level of spoken and written Basque.
time_txt2_title: High School and University Entrance Exam
time_txt2_desc: In June 2019, I completed Scientific High School and passed the University Entrance Exam.
time_txt3_title: Higher Degree in Web Application Development
time_txt3_desc: In March 2021, I completed the higher degree with a duration of 2 years, where I learned to design web pages using CSS, HTML, JS, Angular, PHP, and SQL, among many others. I also used programs like Visual Studio Code, phpMyAdmin, XAMPP, and more.
time_txt4_title: Internship as a Programmer at Serinfor
time_txt4_desc: In June 2021, I completed a 3-month internship at Serinfor where I had to:
time_txt5_desc: In July 2021, I took and obtained the First English Title certifying the level of spoken, written, and reading English with a score of 168.
time_txt6_title: Higher Degree in Multiplatform Application Development
time_txt6_desc: In March 2022, I completed my second higher degree with a duration of 1 year, where I learned to program and develop applications for Android devices using Kotlin and XML.
time_txt7_title: Internship as a Programmer at Bilbomatica
time_txt7_desc: In June 2022, I completed a 3-month internship at Bilbomatica where my tasks included:
time_txt8_desc: In July 2023, I took and obtained the Advanced English Title certifying the level of spoken, written, and reading English with a score of 186.
time_txt9_desc: I am currently a student at Campus 42 Urduliz, where I started my studies after passing the July pool, and where I program and study C and shell.
contact_info: If you believe I meet the requirements and/or could join your team/company or if you want more information, feel free to contact me through any of the channels below!
